description: Synthetic internal process outlining steps for user password recovery.

sections.title: Standard Reset
sections.text: Users can reset their passwords via the login page by entering their account email and following the reset instructions.

sections.title: Expired Reset Link
sections.text: Password reset emails expire after 24 hours. Users must request a new link if the previous one has expired.

sections.title: Locked Accounts
sections.text: If a user fails multiple reset attempts, the account may be temporarily locked for security reasons.
